item.description: Alexander H. Nick, III (“Xan”) is President & Managing Member of Plyint, LLC. He has over 20 years of experience in software development and has worked with several large fortune 50 companies leading multiple workstreams of software delivery. He is a graduate of the University of Illinois Urbana-Champaign (UIUC) holding a Bachelors in Computer Science from the College of Engineering.
